page.title: 14Our Garage at Watch Hill.
page.content: My Dad is a mechanic.A mechanic's job is to fix cars. Sometimes I help my Dad fix a car.I can start a car but I can't drive it.When I grow up I want to be a mechanic.My Dad has to go up our lonning into his garage.As well as fixing cars he mends bikes and lawn mowers.It is a good job because you meet people and make new friends. My Dad has one pick-up van and two cars and three scrap cars.He starts work about 9.00 and finishes at 16.00,so we hardly see him all the day. These are some of the tools my Dad uses;a welder for joining metal together,spanners for tighting nuts,a drill for making holes,a jack for lifting cars and screw drivers for screwing screws in.My Dad told me it took him five years to train to be a mechanic. He has had his garage for four years.
